news.news: I passed my Ph.D. dissertation defense!!
My Ph.D. dissertation defense is scheduled!

Our paper titled "Investigating Orphan Transactions in the Bitcoin Network" has been published in the June 2021 issue (volume 18, issue 2) of the IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management (TNSM)!!
Our paper titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network" has been published in the June 2021 issue (volume 18, issue 2) of the IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management (TNSM)!!
I got married!!
Our paper titled "Investigating Orphan Transactions in the Bitcoin Network" is available under Early Access in IEEE Xplore
Our paper titled "Investigating Orphan Transactions in the Bitcoin Network" has been accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management (TNSM)!!
Our paper titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network" is available under Early Access in IEEE Xplore
Our paper titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network" has been accepted for publication in the IEEE Transactions on Network and Service Management (TNSM)!!
I have passed my Ph.D. Prospectus Defense!!
My Ph.D. Prospectus Defense is scheduled for Friday, Oct 16, 2020
BU ECE wrote an article on our best paper award in ECE Spotlight
I presented the paper titled TxProbe: Discovering Bitcoin's Network Topology Using Orphan Transactions at the Tenth annual BU RISCS Seminar on Practical Security
We have been invited to submit an extended version of our IEEE ICBC 2020 paper to the IEEE Transaction on Network and Service Management (TNSM)!!
Our paper submitted to IEEE ICBC 2020 has won the best paper award!!
Served as a judge in the Massachusetts Science & Engineering Fair
Our paper titled "Characterizing Orphan Transactions in the Bitcoin Network" has been accepted for publication in the 2020 IEEE Internation Conference on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC 2020)!!
Our latest paper titled "Characterizing Orphan Transactions in the Bitcoin Network" is now available on arXiv
I presented on the topic of selfish mining attacks in the Bitcoin network at the Ninth annual BU RISCS Seminar on Practical Security
I presented our paper at the IEEE ICBC 2019 conference at SKT Tower, Seoul, South Korea
I presented our poster titled Churn in the Bitcoin Network: Characterization and Impact at the New England Networking and Systems Day
Served as a judge in the Junior Science and Humanities Symposium - Southern New England Division
Our submission titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network: Characterization and Impact" has been accepted as a poster at the New England Networking and Systems Day!!
Our paper titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network: Characterization and Impact" has been accepted for publication in the 2019 IEEE Internation Conference on Blockchain and Cryptocurrency (ICBC 2019)!!
I gave a presentation titled "Churn in the Bitcoin Network- Characterization and Impact" at CGSW 6.0
I have been accepted as a student speaker at the 2019 CISE Graduate Student Workshop (CGSW 6.0)!!
I presented our poster titled "Measuring Bitcoin's Resilience to Churn" at the ACM Internet Measurement Conference 2018
Our submission titled "Measuring Bitcoin's Resilience to Churn" has been accepted as a poster at the ACM Internet Measurement Conference 2018!!
I presented on the topic of anonymity in the Bitcoin network at the Eight annual BU RISCS Seminar on Practical Security
I have officially advanced to Ph.D. Candidacy status!!
I have successfully passed my RPC exam!!
